title: Yerba Santa Leaves | Sacred Herb
description: Yerba Santa is burned for purification, used for healing, carried for protection, and added to herbal blends for divination.
cleaned_text: Trust in your instincts and tap into what a particular image means most to you. Yerba Santa, also known as "Sacred Herb," is a plant native to California and Mexico and has been used in various spiritual and medicinal rituals by indigenous communities for centuries. Some of the ritual uses of Yerba Santa leaves include: Smudging: The dried leaves of Yerba Santa can be burned as part of a smudging ritual to purify and cleanse a space or object of negative energy. Healing: The plant has been used for its medicinal properties to treat a variety of ailments, and its leaves can be made into a tea or tincture for use in healing rituals. Protection: Yerba Santa is believed to provide protection and spiritual shielding, and its leaves can be carried in a medicine bag or used to make protective charms. Spirit Communication: The plant is also used in rituals for communicating with the spirit world and is sometimes added to herbal blends for divination practices.
